com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui
Class GuiSocketOut

java.lang.Object
  com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui.ConsoleGui
      com.n9mtq4.console.lib.gui.GuiSocketOut
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class GuiSocketOut
extends ConsoleGui

A ConsoleGui that takes any output and Sends it over a socket for a client somewhere to recieve

See Also:
Serialized Form

print

public void print(java.lang.String text,
                  Colour colour)
Get all output and send it to ip:port

Overrides:
print in class ConsoleGui
Parameters:
text - The string that the user wants to print that should be handled
colour - The colour that the user wants to print the text in. If colour is null, it will be automatically set to the defaultTextColour, however, if you haven't given defaultTextColour a colour be prepared for colour to be null
See Also:
ConsoleGui.setDefaultTextColour(com.n9mtq4.console.lib.utils.Colour), ConsoleGui.getDefaultTextColour()
